name: Elite Warriors: Vietnam
description: Infiltrate deep into Laos with your Green Beret and Montgnard teammates, hunted by trackers and bloodhounds, outnumbered at times 100-to-1. See why SOG veterans went on to found Delta Force and in the work of secret operations, remain the stuff of legends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
